name: Massive Malleable
description: The Massive Malleable is a gargantuan aberration, capable of shapeshifting and regeneration. It has a fleshy appearance and can absorb other malleables.
memorable: Its ability to absorb other malleable creatures to heal, along with its capacity to drain life through psychic attacks, makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: To absorb and regenerate from other malleables while draining the life force from opponents.
relations: Often encountered with lesser malleables and may serve chaotic forces seeking to spread its chaotic influence.
environment: Typically found in chaotic or unstable areas, possibly where other malleables congregate.
strengths: High durability with 248 hit points and immunity to psychic damage, plus the ability to split into multiple smaller creatures.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity making it less agile in combat and somewhat vulnerable to physical attacks due to its size.
attacks: Can execute multiple attacks with its flesh tendrils, grappling foes and dealing significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Drain, which inflicts heavy psychic damage while reducing the maximum hit points of its target.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can heal from psychic damage instead of taking it.
Can reshape its own form temporarily without gaining new abilities.
Can move through incredibly tight spaces without hindrance.
Has a notable ability to split into smaller malleables when damaged.
Immunity to being blinded and prone enhances its combat effectiveness.
